Reviews.Title: I have installed this system several times.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: It's an ok system to keep an eye on activities going on. The cameras are not real good but ok.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use system functions just like a computer; View anytime, anywhere with remote viewing via internet, smartphone, and tablet
Receive email alerts, with photo, when motion is detected on your property; Record over 2 years' worth of footage on the included 500GB hard drive
Choose motion-activated recording or H.264 compression to maximize storage space; 480TVL Hi-Res cameras provide crisp and detailed video
24IR LEDs for 75ft automatic night vision; Weather-resistant camera housing provides superior functioning through all types of weather
Anti-vandal camera mount; Easily connect to DVR with 65ft cables
ProductInfo.Name: Defender Connected 8CH H.265 500GB Smart Security DVR with 8 x 480TVL 75ft Night Vision Indoor/Outdoor Cameras - 21023
